A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Mediocre at best.

Since the begining of the movie\, when Poe was making fun of the First Order\, eliminating any respect to them or the threat they represent\, to the scene where Luke becomes one with the force for no reason at all. It felt empty\, with a lot of reminiscence from the previous movies. Even the pre-quels worked better around the universe's lore. This movie gave nothing but a bunch of action and popcorn moments. Jesus\, the hell happened to Snoke? That was the most anticlimatic death ever... Luke's training\, the fanservice moment when Yoda appears\, the overall movie felt bland.

 As a SW fan myself\, I'm disappointed. So many things wrong here\, I didn't feel this movie should be a numbered SW entry.

The movie itself was fun to watch\, but not really what I expected from a SW movie.
